existing_features.title: Increase the 3D label text size for the behind-counter wall frame (the "Seven Balance" WallFrameLabel) so it is clearly readable from far away across the room in both the basic fallback room and the full scene dressing implementation.
Add a neon green glow effect to the edge of the behind-counter rectangular frame (the menu board frame) in both the basic fallback room and the full scene dressing implementation.
